com.darwinreforged.server.core.chat

Class LegacyText

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.darwinreforged.server.core.chat.LegacyText

  • public final class LegacyText
extends java.lang.Object
    Legacy text is a conversion util which will convert a "legacy" chat string into a TextObject, and a TextObject into a legacy string

      • fromLegacy

        public static Text fromLegacy(java.lang.String legacyText,
                              char characterSubstitute)
        This function takes in a legacy text string and converts it into a Text.

        Legacy text strings use the ChatColor.SECTION_SYMBOL. Many keyboards do not have this symbol however, which is probably why it was chosen. To get around this, it is common practice to substitute the symbol for another, then translate it later. Often '&' is used, but this can differ from person to person. In case the string does not have a ChatColor.SECTION_SYMBOL, the method also checks for the

        Parameters:
        legacyText - The text to make into an object
        characterSubstitute - The character substitute
        Returns:
        A TextObject representing the legacy text.

      • toLegacy

        public static java.lang.String toLegacy(Text object)
        To legacy string.
        Parameters:
        object - the object
        Returns:
        the string

      • toLegacy

        public static java.lang.String toLegacy(Text text,
                                        char charSubstitute)
        Takes an Text and transforms it into a legacy string.
        Parameters:
        text - - The Text to transform to.
        charSubstitute - - The substitute character to use if you do not want to use ChatColor.SECTION_SYMBOL
        Returns:
        A legacy string representation of a text object
